name: Morbus
description:
Morbus is an arena twin-stick shooter. When you shoot an enemy he looses a part of his mass, which you can then collect. If an enemy hits you, he takes a part of your mass.

Sköll Studio :
William Philbert (SeigneurNecron - Developer)
Vincent Metallo (Mevi - Graphic Designer)
Jerôme Mathis (T05 - Sound Designer)

You can find our current main project, Koloro, here : http://mevi.fr/koloro.html
